homeTitle: Starting on a New Key: From Music to Coding
homeDescription: I am Olesia Kubska, a passionate Full Stack Developer dedicated to building and optimizing interactive, user-friendly, and feature-rich websites.

aboutHighlights.devSkillsText: Skilled in JavaScript, React, Angular, Node.js, SQL, MongoDB, and more through intensive training and real projects.
aboutHighlights.creativityText: My background in music and arts helps me approach problems with creativity and fresh ideas.
aboutHighlights.teamworkText: Experienced in Agile teams, value communication, feedback, and shared success.
aboutHighlights.languagesText: Fluent in Ukrainian, Russian, Polish (B2), and improving English (currently B1).
aboutHighlights.learningText: Always improving my technical and soft skills through courses, coding challenges, and feedback.
aboutHighlights.goalsText: Eager to contribute to impactful projects and grow as a developer in a professional team.

validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters

water.title: WATER TRACKER
water.stack: [HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Redux Toolkit, React Router, Axios, Vite, Node]
water.description: This description highlights your role, key contributions, and the technologies you worked with, offering a clear and concise overview of your involvement in the project. This project showcases my ability to develop a user-centric application utilizing modern web technologies and API integration for a seamless user experience. The application utilizes a backend developed by our team. Feel free to familiarize yourself with it here.

cinemania.title: CINEMANIA
cinemania.description: In the project, I played a crucial role in developing and enhancing the catalog-search section. I was responsible for implementing key functionalities using JavaScript and HTML5. Additionally, I took the initiative to optimize and refine the user interface by making corrections to the SCSS and JavaScript codebase. This experience not only improved my technical skills but also honed my problem-solving abilities when dealing with intricate challenges.

mimino.title: MIMINO HOTEL
mimino.description: Within the project, my primary focus was on designing and developing the restaurant menu section. I leveraged HTML5 and CSS3 to create an appealing and user-friendly interface. Incorporating JavaScript, I implemented interactive features to enhance the overall user experience. This project not only allowed me to enhance my front-end development skills but also provided insights into effective UI/UX design principles.

webstudio.title: WEBSTUDIO
webstudio.description: WEBSTUDIO was an educational project that enabled me to apply and consolidate my understanding of HTML5 and CSS3. Through this endeavor, I gained hands-on experience in building responsive and visually appealing web pages. This project served as a foundation for strengthening my web development capabilities and understanding the fundamentals of creating engaging online content.

AICalendar.title: AI CALENDAR
AICalendar.stack: [.NET 8 ASP.NET Core WebAPI, PromptProcessor + MCP server, React + Vite + TypeScript, FullCalendar, Swagger, OpenAPI, Docker]
AICalendar.description: AI Calendar is an ASP.NET Core WebAPI for managing personal calendar events. It supports natural language prompts, multi-user scheduling, and can integrate with LLMs via MCP. Backend is deployed on Render, frontend on GitHub Pages.

MomBossFamilyPlanner.title: MOM BOSS FAMILY PLANNER
MomBossFamilyPlanner.stack: [Python, Streamlit,  Google Gemini API, Google Calendar API]
MomBossFamilyPlanner.description: MomBoss Family Planner – Agentic AI Hackathon 2025. Welcome to my hackathon project! This AI agent helps busy moms with multiple children organize meaningful family time by using natural language input to generate activity plans and automatically schedule events in Google Calendar.

Commercial.title: VITA VOICE
Commercial.stack: [Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, Formik, Yup, REST API integration, responsive design, Strapi CMS, Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, REST API, Cloudinary, Render deployment, headless CMS architecture]
Commercial.description: Vita Voice is a modern full-stack web platform designed for vocal coaches and their clients. The project includes a responsive frontend built with Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, and Formik for seamless user interaction, dynamic animations, and accessibility-focused UI. The backend is powered by Strapi CMS with TypeScript and PostgreSQL, providing a structured headless API for managing blog content, user submissions, categories, and media. The system integrates Cloudinary for image handling and is deployed on Render. Together, the frontend and backend deliver a smooth, production-ready experience that supports content management, contact form submissions, and scalable future features.
